dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3058937G] Trademark Infringement
dmca.body:
T -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Tuesday, February 13, 2007 12:36 AM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3058937G] Trademark Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Trademark Infringement Added by system at Tuesday, Feb 13 2007 06:33 am X-MailFrom: kehoec@icmcvi.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Feb 13 06:33:24 2007 Received: (qmail 6422 invoked by alias); 13 Feb 2007 12:33:24 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 6419 invoked from network); 13 Feb 2007 12:33:20 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 13 Feb 2007 12:33:20 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 13 Feb 2007 06:33:20 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 13 Feb 2007 06:33:20 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from kehoec@icmcvi.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HGwqV-0006mm-KT for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 13 Feb 2007 06:33:20 -0600 Received: from smtpout07-01.prod.mesa1.secureserver.net ([64.202.165.230] helo=smtpout07-04.prod.mesa1.secureserver.net) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from kehoec@icmcvi.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1HGwqH-000AJn-4B for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 13 Feb 2007 06:33:05 -0600 Received: (qmail 17359 invoked from network); 13 Feb 2007 12:31:50 -0000 Received: from unknown (87.245.101.81) by smtpout07-04.prod.mesa1.secureserver.net (64.202.165.233) with ESMTP; 13 Feb 2007 12:31:45 -0000 From: "Charlene Kehoe" To: Cc: "'Shawn Stephenson'" , "'Karin Biffiger'" Subject: Trademark Infringement Date: Tue, 13 Feb 2007 08:31:58 -0400 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/mixed; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_005F_01C74F49.6E8BC890" X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.5510 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180 Thread-Index: AcdPavPf6xHuOqCoQ3+0EfHpPZEGsA== Message-ID: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 13 Feb 2007 12:33:20.0191 (UTC) FILETIME=[24DD0CF0:01C74F6B] (multipart/mixed) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/related) (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Dear Abuse Team at the Planet, We have found additional CTCA Trademark Infringement on the www.cancerplaces.com site affiliated with The Planet. We hope you will be able to assist us with disabling this site. Thank you, Charlene Kehoe VIA CERTIFIED MAIL RETURN RECIEPT REQUESTED February 13, 2007 Re: Trademark Infringement Mr. Peter Pathos The Planet.com 1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110 Dallas, TX 75207 214-782-7802 Dear Mr. Pathos; International Capital & Management Company, LLLP ("ICMC") owns and licenses to Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Inc. ("CTCA") certain service marks, including the service mark on the term "Cancer Treatment Centers of America". That mark can be found under Registration Number 2273680 in the United States Patent and Trademark Office. Results of a recent internet search shows your website, www.cancerplaces.com, contains references to the words Cancer Treatment Centers of America- a screen print of which is attached hereto. Your improper use of our intellectual property in connection with your website unlawfully implies the existence of a relationship between your business and that of our licensee, and trades upon the goodwill that ICMC and CTCA have developed in the mark. It is clearly designed to cause confusion. As you must be aware, your business has not entered into any type of contractual relationship with CTCA and has never secured permission from ICMC or from CTCA to use CTCA's name or the subject mark. As such, your unauthorized use thereof constitutes trademark infringement. We demand that your business immediately stop these activities and take whatever steps are necessary to remove all references to CTCA or the mark. Please contact me no later than March 20, 2007 to confirm that you have taken these steps. We are fully prepared to do whatever is necessary to protect our interests, but I hope that formal legal action will not be necessary. Sincerely, Cornel Williams Cornel Williams Chief Financial Officer By Charlene Kehoe Director of Intellectual Property Enforcement Charlene Kehoe Development and Marketing Analyst International Capital & Management Company 9015 Havensight Mall, Warehouse K, Ste 3 St. Thomas, VI 00802 340-715-5806 340-777-1303 fx MIME element (text/html)

Dear Abuse Team at the Planet,

 We have found additional CTCA Trademark Infringement on the www.cancerplaces.com site affiliated with The Planet. We hope you will be able to assist us with disabling this site.

Thank you,

Charlene Kehoe           & nbsp;           & nbsp;           & nbsp;           & nbsp;           & nbsp;           & nbsp;           & nbsp;           & nbsp;         

          &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;           &nbs p;

 

VIA CERTIFIED MAIL RETURN RECIEPT REQUESTED

 < /o:p>

                                                                                                                     February 13, 2007

Re: Trademark Infringement

 

Mr. Peter Pathos

The Planet.com

1333 North Stemmons Freeway

Suite 110

Dallas, TX 75207

214-782-7802

 

Dear Mr. Pathos;

 

International Capital & Management Company, LLLP (“ICMC”) owns and licenses to Cancer Treatment Centers of America, Inc. (“CTCA”) certain service marks, including the service mark on the term “Cancer Treatment Centers of America”.  That mark can be found under Registration Number 2273680 in the United States Patent and Trademark Office.

 

Results of a recent internet search shows your website, www.cancerplaces.com, contains references to the words Cancer Treatment Centers of America- a screen print of which is attached hereto.

 

Your improper use of our intellectual property in connection with your website unlawfully implies the existence of a relationship between your business and that of our licensee, and trades upon the goodwill that ICMC and CTCA have developed in the mark.  It is clearly designed to cause confusion.  As you must be aware, your business has not entered into any type of contractual relationship with CTCA and has never secured permission from ICMC or from CTCA to use CTCA’s name or the subject mark.  As such, your unauthorized use thereof constitutes trademark infringement.

 

We demand that your business immediately stop these activities and take whatever steps are necessary to remove all references to CTCA or the mark.  Please contact me no later than March 20, 2007 to confirm that you have taken these steps.  We are fully prepared to do whatever is necessary to protect our interests, but I hope that formal legal action will not be necessary.

 

Sincerely,

 

Cornel Williams

 

Cornel Williams

Chief Financial Officer

 

 

By Charlene Kehoe

Director of Intellectual Property Enforcement 

 

 

Charlene Kehoe

Development and Marketing Analyst

International Capital & Management Company

9015 Havensight Mall, Warehouse K, Ste 3

St. Thomas, VI 00802

340-715-5806

340-777-1303 fx
